songs.title: SCUM GANG
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Mr. Bentley (Mr. Bentley)
Scum Gang!
Mr. Bentley (Mr. Bentley)
Yeah
Mr. Bentley (Mr. Bentley)

[Chorus]
Fuckin' it with the ho's out, poppin' it with the gold mouth (Scum Gang!)
Fuck the trap, I got a whorehouse
Fuck the trap, I got a whorehouse
Guns up with them calls out, already know what my squad 'bout
Scum Gang with them toys out, Scum Gang with them toys out
Fuckin' it with the ho's out, poppin' it with the gold mouth
Fuck the trap, I got a whorehouse
Fuck the trap, I got a whorehouse
Guns up with them calls out, already know what my squad 'bout
Scum Gang with them toys out, Scum Gang with them toys out

[Verse]
Shoot you in your fucking face
Scum Gang in this fucking place
Clap him if the nigga yappin'
Jack him if he holdin' weight
No ski mask, we show the face
Catch him while he on a date
Leave his brains all in his plate
That Scum Gang, nigga (Catch him)
Nigga think he fly 'til we catch him, blast him
War against a army with a handgun, stabbed him
Nigga leaking, he don't know what happened
Dragged him, tie him to the Wraith, keep going faster
Same day, different shit, same bed, different bitch
MAC 10's, extended clips, my young boys, they with the shits
Stake down them military, leave a fuck nigga in the jury
Make 'em hurt, that .5 curl, Scums out, my timber lay
I'm gettin' fucked with my mind drippin', got too much adrenaline
I scream, pass lean, I make shit, I really
With fronts in, nigga, run that, gotta get these digits
Get the fuckin' MAC, you know where it's at, shoot your mans, let it show

[Chorus]
Fuckin' it with the ho's out, poppin' it with the gold mouth
Fuck the trap, I got a whorehouse
Fuck the trap, I got a whorehouse
Guns up with them calls out, already know what my squad 'bout
Scum Gang with them toys out, Scum Gang with them toys out
Fuckin' it with the ho's out, poppin' it with the gold mouth
Fuck the trap, I got a whorehouse
Fuck the trap, I got a whorehouse
Guns up with them calls out, already know what my squad 'bout
Scum Gang with them toys out, Scum Gang with them toys out

[Outro]
Mr. Bentley (Mr. Bentley)
